== Revelation Password Manager ==

Revelation is a password generator and manager.

== Key Features ==

* Store your passwords

* Generate more secure passwords

* Password-protect your passwords

== Screenshot ==

<nowiki>[[File:scrn-revelation.jpg]]</nowiki>

== Installation ==

* Via '''<nowiki>[[Synaptic|Synaptic Package Manager]]</nowiki>'''
* Via apt-get
<pre>
sudo apt-get install revelation
</pre>

== Hints and Tips ==

* Try to keep your passwords well organised from the start

* There is also a panel applet available for Revelation (see: '''<nowiki>[[Applets]]</nowiki>''')

== Other applications you may wish to look at ==

* KeePassX - Cross-platform password manager
